questions.text: The muscle shown in the following diagram is which type of muscle?

options.label: A
options.text: Superior tarsal muscle consists of smooth muscle fibres

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: There is no preganglionic autonomic output from cervical spinal cord

questions.correct_answer: C. Preganglionic autonomic axons from Edinger-Westphal nucleus travel via nerve to superior oblique to the ciliary ganglion
